snippet: The smartphone application WeChat is trying to establish itself as the dominant global player in an expanding market.
abstract: WeChat, smartphone application created by Chinese Internet firm Tencent Holdings, is trying to establish itself as dominant global player in expanding market; app is available in eight languages.
lead_paragraph: The smartphone application WeChat is trying to establish itself as the dominant global player in an expanding market.

headline.seo: Chinese Messaging App Gains Ground Elsewhere
headline.main: Chinese Messaging App Gains Ground Elsewhere
headline.print_headline: Chinese Messaging App Gains Ground Elsewhere
